This wc_lang clone is from
commit e0c191286e53b7acc6954501eac29a3c526a3572
Author: Arthur Goldberg <artgoldberg@gmail.com>
Date:   Thu Mar 14 16:30:58 2019 -0400

This wc_lang directory provides two test wc_lang schemas, which are in core.py and core_modified.py.

Directories and sub-modules which aren't used when wc_lang/core.py is loaded as a schema have been removed to simplify and shrink this clone. Otherwise, this clone is identical to commit e0c191286e53b7acc6954501eac29a3c526a3572.
